Foreign Guests Here
   Pyongyang, February 14 (KCNA) -- Kenichi Ogami, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and his party and a delegation of the National Liaison Council of the Japan Society for Study of Kim Jong Il's Works headed by its Adviser Takao Kamakura arrived here on Wednesday to celebrate the birthday of Kim Jong Il.
